Sparkline Point Figure Javascript Render Using Plotly

sparkline_point_js.Rd

Sparkline Point Figure Javascript Render Using Plotly

sparkline_point_js(
  tbl,
  x,
  type = c("cell", "footer", "header"),
  x_lower = NULL,
  x_upper = x_lower,
  xlim = NULL,
  xlab = "",
  y = seq_along(x),
  vline = NULL,
  text = NULL,
  height = 30,
  width = 150,
  color = "gold",
  color_errorbar = color,
  color_vline = "#00000050",
  legend = FALSE,
  legend_label = NULL,
  legend_title = "",
  legend_position = 0,
  legend_type = c("point", "line", "point+line"),
  margin = rep(0, 5)
)

Arguments

tbl

A data frame
x

A vector of variable names in tbl for value.
type

A character for the type of reactable component.
x_lower

A vector of variable names in tbl for lower error difference.
x_upper

A vector of variable names in tbl for upper error difference. Default is the same as x_lower.
xlim

Numeric vectors of length 2, giving the x coordinates ranges.
xlab

A character for the x-axis label.
y

Numeric vector of y-axis value.
vline

Numeric value for the location to draw the vertical reference line.
text

Character vector of text information dispalted for each point.
height

Numeric value of figure height.
width

Numeric value of figure width.
color

Character vector of point color name
color_errorbar

Character vector of errorbar color name
color_vline

Character vector of vertical reference line color name
legend

A logical value to display legend.
legend_label

A character vector for legend label.
legend_title

A character value for legend title.
legend_position

A numeric value for legend vertical position.
legend_type

A character value for legend type.
margin

A vector of length 5 for figure margin at bottom, left, top, right and padding.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
 
library(reactable)
library(htmltools)

js <- sparkline_point_js(iris, "Sepal.Length")
js <- sparkline_point_js(iris, "Sepal.Length", text = "x")
js <- sparkline_point_js(iris, "Sepal.Length", text = "'count:' + x")
js <- sparkline_point_js(iris, "Sepal.Length", x_lower = "Sepal.Width", 
                         text = "'range:' + x + '(' + x_lower + ',' + x_upper + ')'" )
js <- sparkline_point_js(iris, "Sepal.Length", x_lower = "Sepal.Width")
js <- sparkline_point_js(iris, "Sepal.Length", vline = 6)

js <- sparkline_point_js(iris, 
                         x = c("Sepal.Length", "Sepal.Width"), 
                         x_lower = "Sepal.Width",
                         y = c(1,2),
                         text = c("x[0]", "x[1]"),
                         color = c("gold", "purple") )
cat(js)

col <- colDef(html = TRUE, cell = JS(js), width = 150,
              style="font-size: 0px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px;")
p <- reactable(data = iris[,1:2],
               theme = reactableTheme(cellPadding = "0px 8px"),
               borderless = TRUE,
               highlight = TRUE,
               resizable = TRUE,
               columns = list(Sepal.Length = col))
               
plotly_js <- "https://unpkg.com/react-plotly.js@1.0.2/dist/create-plotly-component.js"
browsable(tagList(
  reactR::html_dependency_react(),
  htmltools::tags$script(src="https://cdn.plot.ly/plotly-latest.min.js"),
  htmltools::tags$script(src=plotly_js),
  p
))

}
